CustomField.formula: IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-FR", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell Starts", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),24, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-IT", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell Starts", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),24, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-DE", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell Starts", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),24, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "France", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),5 ,0))))
CustomField.label: NVM CLID3
